meet Duckie Duckie is a grey tuxedo who loves belly rubs treats and his little brother Birdie PERIOD Duckuie can play fetch with his toys and his 



The West Virginia baseball team was able to salvage its opening weekend with two victories despite lategame struggles in two of the three games PERIOD

After a  victory over Iowa in the opener of the Big EastBig Ten Challenge on Friday the Mountaineers lost a tworun lead to Penn State in a  loss Saturday PERIOD WVU  came back with a  victory over Illinois Sunday PERIOD

 said WVU baseball coach Greg Van Zant PERIOD 

The Mountaineers were led by solid pitching throughout the weekend PERIOD Senior righthander Andy Berry started Sundays game and faced  batters in . innings giving up three hits and two runs PERIOD Sophomore lefthander Michael Twigg came in relief for Berry allowing three hits and two runs PERIOD

Twigg allowed Illinois to tie the game in the top half of the ninth but WVU came out on top after senior Justin McDavid hit an RBI single in the bottom of the ninth to give the team the walkoff win PERIOD

 Van Zant said PERIOD 

West Virginia saw success on the mound all weekend including an impressive appearance from junior lefthander Jonathan Jones in Fridays game PERIOD Jones pitched . innings striking out five while holding Iowa to two hits and no runs PERIOD Redshirt senior Marcus Broadwater came in relief for Jones holding the Hawkeyes to two hits PERIOD

Alongside the strong pitching the Mountaineers also received a boost from senior shortstop Grant Buckners bat PERIOD He hit home runs in his first two atbats against Iowa to lead the Mountaineers to a  victory PERIOD

 Van Zant said PERIOD 

The Mountaineers lost a  lead over Penn State on Saturday after allowing three runs in the bottom of the eighth inning in the  defeat PERIOD

Broadwater came in relief for freshman lefthander Harrison Musgrave who made his presence known in his first collegiate start PERIOD

Musgrave struck out eight Nittany Lions in . innings pitched allowing only three hits while surrendering no walks PERIOD Broadwater allowed two hits and two runs in a third of an inning before Josh McCauley surrendered the lead PERIOD

 Van Zant said of Musgraves debut PERIOD 

The Big East won the Big EastBig Ten Challenge for the second year in a row PERIOD
